summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in between Blocks Four (4) and Five (5), Washington Place Addition, being the alley between Twenty-ninth Avenue and Thirtieth Avenue, from Yesler Way to East Spruce Street, all in the City of Seattle; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 73354, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
